mapper.select: SELECT ANIME_ID as animeId, TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL AS thumnailGaroUrl, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL AS thumnailSeroUrl, WEEKDAY, SCORE AS score, TAGS FROM TBL_ANIME WHERE WEEKDAY IS NOT NULL AND WEEKDAY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{today}, '%') ORDER BY TITLE
SELECT TITLE AS title, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL AS thumnailGaroUrl FROM TBL_ANIME WHERE ANIME_ID = #{animeId}

SELECT ANIME_ID as animeId, TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL AS thumnailGaroUrl, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL AS thumnailSeroUrl, WEEKDAY, SCORE AS score, TAGS FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_ANIME ORDER BY SCORE DESC LIMIT 10 ) AS A
